item.title: Fetch SP list items from another site using PnP JS.
item.author: Kunj Sangani
item.description: Introduction SharePoint Online has gained more popularity with the release of REST API and SPFx. Data operation becomes easy in Client-Side Solution with the help of REST API. All these APIs work under current user permission and there could be a scenario that current users can have access to multiple site collection and we would need to fetch data for cross-site collection. How we can fetch cross-site collection data is a question, but with the help of PnPJs this question can be easily solved.
